If anyone is interested I have 1 copy of the following:

O-Odachi to Kodogu (Ancient Big Swords and Sword Fittings) 1994.7"x10.25"
soft covers, 84pp of which 52pp are plates showing 26 large tachi & yari and
in
colour 20 tsuba & 12 mitokoromono with some koshirae, menuki etc.
GBP35

Alan
